titles.title: To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 747 Broadway in Albany, New York, as the "United States Postal Service Henry Johnson Annex".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/19/2002--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Post Office building known as the United States Postal Service Carrier Annex located at 747 Broadway in Albany, New York, as the United States Postal Service Henry Johnson Annex.
